version_description:
- iPhone support
- Cloud save
- UI/UX and Game logic improvements
- Bug-fixes

- Fixed several stuck on loading levels
- Fixed some stuck quests
- Fixed missed effects
- Returned developer console (5 taps on version number in settings, and then tap at the top of the screen in the game)
- Small performance tweaks
- Localisation improvements
- Other minor tweaks

- Improved terrain visuals
- Several stuck quests fixes
- Duplicates spawn fix
- Various UI improvements
- Bug fixes
